question: In an agentic RAG pipeline, what new role does the LLM take on beyond generating responses?
options: Acting as an agent to make decisions about data source selection
Encrypting sensitive information in user inputs
correct_answer: Acting as an agent to make decisions about data source selection
explanation: In an agentic RAG pipeline, the LLM takes on a more active role by making decisions about which data sources to use, enhancing its functionality beyond just generating responses.
